text: Aaishi 001. Mujhe exactly yaad nahi kaise pehli baar mille the but uske baad saath hi the. Bahut philosophical baate karta hai tu, tab toh psychology ka course kar rha tha isiliye. Aur uske baad exam ke time pe library mein kam aur ccd mein zyaada baithna. Exams ke beech mein tennis khelna. Lucknow ka trip. Last antaragni mein kurte pehenke nikale the. Rooftop pe discussions. Late night chaupathi jaana, Ishu har baar rota tha par aajaata tha. Aur tera hindi aur English bolne ka unique tareeka humesha funny lagega. Obhiously tu life mein chaapega aur bahut saare trips pe chalenge bullet pe.
author: Satyam  Ralhan

text: Gupta ji aapke baare mein toh kya hi kehna. Humesha se chaapu insaan. Mere graduate hone ka reason tu bhi hai ek. Pehle bahut shareef samajh liya tha tujhe, bahut badi galti kardi. But baadmein bahut besharam ho gaya tu, start hone ke baad rukta hi nahi tha tu, gussa karo toh hass deta tha. Bahut khela hai FIFA tere saath. Alt f4 toh nahi bhuulunga kabhi. Aur CSO202 ka endsem bhi ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Aur OS ki wo surprise quiz. Bas kabhi mere assignment group mein nahi aaya tu ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜…. Tere saath jaake cheese burst kaana sab bahut yaad aaega. FIFA 22 is on. Baaki toh korea mein chaapna aur tere pet ko salaam.
author: Satyam  Ralhan

text: Aur be kaisa hai be. Kaafi chill insaan hai tu, kissi cheez ki tension nahi leta tha. Atrangi baate karta hai tu kaafi. First year mein football mein mille the uske baad fortnite ka squad bana aur saari football ki treats. Bahut mazze kiye hai tere saath. Aur tu toh pro hai hi ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Hall 3 tera doosra room tha , room pe padhe rehta tha. Oat pe aisi hi jaake bala pe naachna yaad rahega. Mama mio, chick blast, kfc , china town sab bahut thoosa hai tere saath. Aur woh waale din 2020 march mein jab bahut kam log the campus mein tab bahut bakchodi kaati thi. Wo holi aur poori raat oat ki rooftop pe telescope se aasmaan ko dekna, gajab ki feel thi. Last night jaldi so gaya tha uska zyaada duukh hai ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜…. Joke maarte rahiyo humesha.
author: Satyam  Ralhan

text: Aur chotu, bhai college shuuru bhi tere saath hua aur khatam bhi. Mini militia ke naam nahi bhuulunga aur screenshots toh ab tak hai. Tu mere se milne nahi aata ya main tere se milne nahi aata yahi chalta tha humara ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Mast aadmi hai tu, sab karleta hai aur confidence tagda hai tera, height ke hisaab se kuch zyaada hi hai. Tezz bhaagta hai tu saale ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. College khatam hone se pehle ek bakchod sa trip maar hi liya bhai. Waapas campus aane ke baad toh din mein 5 5 sports khelna, regular gym bhi jaane lag gaye the, induction waali maggi ka pyaar bahut mast experiences rahe hai. Not sad because it ended but happy because it happened jaisa tu bolta tha. More trips to come bro.
author: Satyam  Ralhan
